Articles.Content: hello since yesterday that I am trying to buy the expansion of the Story Mode and I can not, I have contacted the technical support and they have told me that they had problems with the servers but today I am trying to buy it and I have not been successful either. They reject my credit card (which is the one I buy with steam), and I have tried it for paypal (which is the one I bought the game with 2 years ago) and I do not miss payment error either. I want the expansion as I have to do? Call NASA?
